entry.title: Homework Problems (Day-2)
entry.summary: - Video for Quartus design flow has been uploaded on the website. This video contains some extra information that will help you understand the tools better. Please go through it before starting with the homework problems.

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: This workshop will begin from 28th June. Make sure you have access to MS Teams for this workshop. If you don't have access, please post a message via google group.
